title: Where do we report people who bought their accounts off ebay?

replies.body:
btw do you like literally only play viktor? like if you dont mid and you have to jungle or adc do you still play viktor? 

I've always wondered
I say mid or feed but I don't actually feed. If he's banned or mid is taken then I go shaco jungle, if that's taken then I'll just go anywhre else.

Fair enough. Another question, compleltey off topic, but what the fuck do you do after your press R on someone on Viktor? Do you have to like keep controlling it? or just leave it to do whatever it's heart desires?
I just leave it cause they're probs dead. If not just move it, it does a lot of damage.
....How do you move it... Sorry Viktor confuses me xD
I just send a ticket via support.
